description: List ball information. By default, lists ball ID, radius, contact count, fixity, and position. Use keywords to list specific attributes, contacts, groups, properties, or results. Use model precision command to control floating point precision.

keywords.name: attribute
keywords.description: List ball attributes. If no attribute specified, shows available attributes.

keywords.name: contact
keywords.description: List contacts with each ball (ID, type, activity, model). Use 'all' to include inactive contacts.

keywords.name: extra
keywords.description: List extra variable values at index i

keywords.name: group
keywords.description: List group names at slot s

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: List ball properties (surface conditions for contact models). If no property specified, shows available properties for each ball.

keywords.name: result
keywords.description: List tabulated ball model results (see ball results command)

examples.description: List default info (ID, radius, contacts, fixity, position) for all balls
List applied force for all balls
List value of extra variable at index 2 for all balls
List normal stiffness property for all balls

examples.command: ball list attribute velocity range group 'active'
examples.description: List velocity for balls in 'active' group

examples.command: ball list contact all range id 1 100
examples.description: List all contacts (active and inactive) for balls 1-100

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Ball getter methods: Ball.pos(), Ball.vel(), Ball.radius(), Ball.density(), etc. - requires iteration: for b in itasca.ball.list(): print(b.pos())
